snippet.title: Amanda the Adventurer 2 Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
In Amanda the Adventurer 2, the story continues as Riley encounters a mysterious masked figure after destroying the TV in the attic. Travel to the Kensdale Public Library and dig deeper into the mystery of Amanda the Adventurer. 

Wishlist Amanda the Adventurer 2 here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2826800/Amanda_the_Adventurer_2/

Follow development here: https://x.com/AmandaAdvnturer

Find the publisher here: https://x.com/DreadXPGames
